        @Deprecated
public <any> createCollection(com.lucidworks.apollo.common.models.Collection collection)
                                   throws com.lucidworks.apollo.common.error.RESTError
        Deprecated. 
        Create a Collection without its related default objects.
        Parameters:
        collection -
        Returns:
        Throws:

      • createCollection

        @Deprecated
public <any> createCollection(com.lucidworks.apollo.common.models.Collection collection,
                                          boolean createDefaultPipelines)
                                   throws com.lucidworks.apollo.common.error.RESTError
        Deprecated. 
        Create a Collection and optionally its related default objects. Keeping this around for the many direct callers we have. Ideally, all calls to this class would come from CollectionResource, but that is not the case. Normally the creation of a Collection's related objects happens in the Orchestrator, but for certain startup cases we still rely on direct calls to CollectionManager. This and createCollection(Collection) are not called by CollectionResource.
        Parameters:
        collection -
        createDefaultPipelines -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        com.lucidworks.apollo.common.error.RESTError

      • createSystemCollection

        public <any> createSystemCollection(com.lucidworks.apollo.common.models.Collection collection,
                                    com.lucidworks.apollo.common.models.Collection.CollectionType collectionType,
                                    java.lang.String searchClusterConfigPrefix,
                                    java.lang.String configPrefix,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> features,
                                    boolean createPipelines,
                                    Configuration userConfiguration)
                             throws com.lucidworks.apollo.common.error.RESTError
        Handles a lot of the boilerplate for creating system collections: looking up search cluster and collection layout based on properties, optionally enabling features, and so on.
        Parameters:
        collection - note that this argument may be modified, based on configuration.
        collectionType - the collectionType to set on the above collection. Called out specifically to make sure people set it.
        searchClusterConfigPrefix -
        configPrefix -
        features -
        createPipelines -
        userConfiguration -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        com.lucidworks.apollo.common.error.RESTError

      • configureCollectionLayout

        public void configureCollectionLayout(com.lucidworks.apollo.common.models.Collection collection,
                                      java.lang.String clusterName,
                                      org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration... configs)
                               throws com.lucidworks.apollo.common.error.RESTError
        Configures the numShards, replicationFactor, and maxShardsPerNodes parameters for creating a collection based on configuration settings and the cluster size. This method generates a RESTError if there are no live nodes in the Solr cluster.
        Parameters:
        collection -
        clusterName -
        configs -
        Throws:
        com.lucidworks.apollo.common.error.RESTError
